channel.title: Auto Cache Downloader problem, Only gets around 4 or 5 files in my C:
channel.description: I'm pretty sure I've done it right, but everytime I start the client with the new dropbox link it only downloads like 4 or 5 files into my C:\ for some reason and its frustrating. Please help me someone :palm:

item.title: Auto Cache Downloader problem, Only gets around 4 or 5 files in my C:
item.dc:creator: @AgressionXRsps AgressionXRsps
item.description:
@AgressionXRsps wrote:

I’ve just fixed mine, i could certainly help you fix yours, if you want to fix it, for example lets say your dropbox link is
https://www.dropbox.com/s/blahblahblah/client.jar
instead of www , replace it with dl.dropbox.com
and instead of dropbox.com, make it dropboxusercontent.com so all together it should look like this!
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/blahblahblah/client.jar
hope this helps, if not ill tv you!

Read full topic
item.source: Auto Cache Downloader problem, Only gets around 4 or 5 files in my C:
